catalog.name: Stomatal Conductance Constant CO2 Land-Historical Experiment

dataset.name: Stomatal Conductance Constant CO2 Land-Historical Experiment

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR GDEX - Stomatal Conductance Constant CO2 Land-Historical Experiment(d197009)

metadata.documentation: The Community Land Model version 5 (CLM5) was used to conduct a no-Water Use Efficiency land-historical experiment. This experiment has been used in conjunction with other CLM5 LUMIP land-only (historical) experiments to separate the effect of water use efficiency from that of vegetation growth in the Southeastern United States.
